name: You're Invited
description:
You're Invited is a Zombies, Run! Interactive  Fanfic set in a Vampires AU. You play Runner Five, a private investigator looking into the disappearances that have been plaguing Abel Township as of late. Your current suspects? The De Lucas, a sibling pair who have suddenly taken residence in Abel Manor.

This story will have mystery, romance, and some goofy nonsense. It's currently in-development.
